column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou's is my favorite deep dish in the city. I know Todd and Brian don't like it but that's okay with me. Also
column3: Todd doesn't even like the Beatles! So I'm not sure what to think about him. I know what I think about Lou Malnati's pizza
column4: it's a 10/10. I love the sausage and pepperoni deep dish.
